testcase.name: testQueryProductByProductId
testcase.system-out: [2019-05-23] 13:25:34.225 assets- [main]-[BaseJdbcLogger.java:139]-[DEBUG] ==> Preparing: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_desc, p.img_addr, p.normal_price, p.promotion_price, p.priority, p.create_time, p.last_edit_time, p.enable_status, p.product_category_id, p.shop_id, pm.img_addr AS detail_img, pm.img_desc, pm.priority, pm.create_time FROM tb_product p LEFT JOIN tb_product_img pm ON p.product_id=pm.product_id WHERE p.product_id=? ORDER BY pm.priority DESC [2019-05-23] 13:25:34.227 assets- [main]-[BaseJdbcLogger.java:139]-[DEBUG] ==> Parameters: 1(Long) [2019-05-23] 13:25:34.300 assets- [main]-[BaseJdbcLogger.java:139]-[DEBUG] <== Total: 1
